## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G25060](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G25060)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>RRC1</u>
- **Gene Name:** reduced red-light responses in cry1cry2 background 1
- **Description:**   RNA recognition motif (RRM)-containing protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2179295
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
